description: Make a deliciously satisfying bolognese with just five ingredients. Follow this easy bolognese recipe for a tasty pasta you'll want to have again and again.
name: Easy beef bolognese Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Macro Organic Spanish extra virgin olive oil
500 g Macro Organic lean beef mince
500 g Macro Organic bolognese chunky pasta sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Add pasta to frying pan and cook, stirring, until heated through. Sprinkle with parsley and serve.
Add pasta to frying pan and cook, stirring, until heated through. Sprinkle with parsley and serve.
